languages.text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as a target of their ability, the wearer immediately gains <u>(FEL bonus / 2)</u> MP.
Targeted ally gains <u>(wearer's FEL bonus / 2)</u> MP at the start of this ally's next turn.

Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +<u>(wearer's FEL bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}MP{/g} at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +<u>(wearer's FEL bonus / 2)</u> MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
每当装备者选择盟友作为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}目标时，装备者立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}。
目标盟友在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时获得额外移动点数，等同于{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者选择盟友作为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}目标时，装备者立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>。
目标盟友在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}移动点数{/g}，等同于<u>（装备者的社交加值/2）</u>。

每当装备者选择盟友作为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}目标时，装备者立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}。
目标盟友在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时获得额外移动点数，等同于{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}。

languages.text:
Выбирая союзника в качестве цели своей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, персонаж немедленно получает +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Выбранный союзник получает +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} ОП в начале своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Выбирая союзника в качестве цели своей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, персонаж немедленно получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g},
а этот союзник получает +<u>(бонус ОБЩ персонажа / 2)</u> ОП в начале своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Выбирая союзника в качестве цели своей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, персонаж немедленно получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g},
а этот союзник получает +<u>(бонус ОБЩ персонажа / 2)</u> ОП в начале своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Выбирая союзника в качестве цели своей {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, персонаж немедленно получает +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g},
а этот союзник получает +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} ОП в начале своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとして味方を選択すると、自身に+{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を即時付与。
ターゲットになった味方は自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に+{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}のMPを獲得。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとして味方を選択すると、自身に+<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を即時付与。
ターゲットになった味方は自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に+<u>(自身のFELボーナス/2)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}MP{/g}を獲得。

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとして味方を選択すると、自身に+{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を即時付与。
ターゲットになった味方は自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に+{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5}のMPを獲得。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador elige a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, obtiene inmediatamente +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
El aliado objetivo recibe +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} PM al comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador elige a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, obtiene inmediatamente +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
El aliado objetivo recibe +<u>(bonificación por EMP del portador / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PM{/g} al comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Cada vez que el portador elige a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, obtiene inmediatamente +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
El aliado objetivo recibe +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} PM al comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten als Ziel seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wählt, erhält der Träger sofort +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Der anvisierte Verbündete erhält zu Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} BP.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten als Ziel seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wählt, erhält der Träger sofort +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Der anvisierte Verbündete erhält +<u>(des Trägers GEF-Bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}BP{/g} zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} dieses Verbündeten.

Immer wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten als Ziel seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wählt, erhält der Träger sofort +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Der anvisierte Verbündete erhält +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} BP zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} dieses Verbündeten.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur désigne un allié comme cible de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il bénéficie immédiatement de +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
L'allié ciblé obtient quant à lui +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} PD au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur désigne un allié comme cible de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il bénéficie immédiatement de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
L'allié ciblé obtient quant à lui +<u>(bonus de FRA de l'utilisateur / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PD{/g} au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur désigne un allié comme cible de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il bénéficie immédiatement de +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
L'allié ciblé obtient quant à lui +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} PD au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
